Toggle Led

Write data to Ardunio from qt widget. It is the first part of Serial communication tutorial. It covers writing to ardunio serially.

Toggle Led shows how to toggle led on click of any keyboard button using the QSerialPort

Most of the focus would be on QTserial and QtSerailPort classes. I think validation each step for serial communication is take away here.

Ardunio Setup:

Connect a Led Anode to pin 13 and cathode to pin GND.

Ardunio Code
